title.text: Public is broadly supportive of workforce automation being limited to "dangerous and dirty" jobs % of U.S. adults who say they would the following policies in the event that robots and computers are capable of doing many humanjobs

values: If machines were limited to doing dangerous or unhealthy jobs
If people could pay extra to interact with a human when buying something
If the govt offered all Americans a guaranteed income that would meet their basic needs
If the govt created a national service program that would pay people to perform tasks
